segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, it's almost amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl is eagerly waiting for her share, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman doesn't hear the commotion behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy might tip over any second now, and that would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it's spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the woman so unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but they might end up broken if someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with their little cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of chaos and calm, it's quite intriguing.
segments.speaker: PAR
